name: Project: Isolation Beta
description:
My first game so any feedback would be greatly appreciated.

You are trying to escape the planet but the robots wont let you.... try to kill them all and just maybe you will escape.....

Made for the AI and Games Jam 2022

some bugs I know about:

Mouse sensitivity gets really high 

bullets sometimes don't register hitting you

Again this is my first project so any feedback would be greatly appreciated so I can get better.
